_sText:
Very simple Archievement Map made quite a while ago.

You can use it for the Weapon, C4 and some of the special Archievements.

Give the Bots only Knives and enjoy. ;)

Hi,
I just wanted to create a fully automatized map to win as much pistol round as you need, you don't have to do anything (not even shooting) beside starting the map and joining ct, you'll get the 4 achievements listed below within 4-5 minutes if you start from 0 pistol round.

Should work in both single-player and multi-player, however in a server players would have to take turn since there is only one spawnpoint.

To start it in single-player just use the map command in your game console:
map dev_pistol_round_a1

With this map you can do:

Black Bag Operation

Win a round while making no footstep noise and killing at least one enemy

Piece Initiative

Win 5 Pistol Rounds

Give Piece a Chance

Win 25 Pistol Rounds

Piece Treaty

Win 250 Pistol Rounds

My other achievement map:
dev_hostage_a2

Hi,
I just wanted to create a fully automatized map to rescue hostages, you don't have to do anything (not even moving) beside starting the map and joining ct, you'll get the 4 achievements listed below within 3-4 minutes if you start from 0 hostages recued.

Only work in single-player since a server would prevent the +use client command that I do with some trigger, to start it in single-player just use the map command in your game console:
map dev_hostage_a2

With this map you can do:

Cowboy Diplomacy

Rescue 100 hostages

SAR Czar

Rescue 500 hostages

Good Shepherd

Rescue all hostages in a single round

Freed With Speed

Rescue all hostages within 90 seconds

My other achievement map:
dev_pistol_round_a1
type in console: mp_round_restart_delay 0.001 , mp_freezetime 0.001 and have fun!!!

This map is made to help with the hostage achievements 
Sar Czar,  Freed with speed, Cowboy Diplomacy, and Good Shepherd

BOTACTI0N BY UNREAL This is basicly a training map. Add a few bots, or even play with your friends to perfect your skills. This map "includes" a special system that allows players to see through the walls, use it at your will. FAQ Q: Will this get me VAC banned? A: Norsh. Q: Sure? A: Yersh. Q: Am I gay? A: Yersh. Q: ????? A: www.fragxl.com How to? You MUST have r_3dsky command set to "1". Start by adding a few bots to the enemy team (bot_add (t or ct)), buy a weapon and start the massacre. The goal of this map is to simply train your abilities, such as prefiring, spraying and etc. Hope you like it.

1. Host the map without Bots

2. Join CTs

3. Type "mp_round_restart_delay 0" without " " in console

Attention Haters: Go Ahead Keep hatin' on my map! Cause you know its the fastest!

This map allows you to attain God of War and Blood Money Achievements without lifting a finger!

~~~~ SUPER FAST ~~~~
I included a slightly slower version that uses mp_restartgame 1.
~~~~ SUPER FAST ~~~~

It took me about 2 minutes to get the first screenshot! 1624 rounds with 30 bot kills each round! 

Just run the map and it will get you kills all on its own!
You will also receive other achievements as well!

Regular version gets 60+ kills every second! (Maybe faster if you have a better pc). Get 10,000 kills in ~2 Minutes!

Double your slots to 60 and get them even faster!!!


Instructions:
1) Create a server
2) ---- JOIN THE TERRORIST TEAM ---- VERY IMPORTANT
3) Make mp_autobalance 0 and mp_limitteams 0
4) Add bots using bot_add_(team)
5) IF YOU WANT TO SWITCH TEAMS - USE THE BUTTON!!!!

THE BUTTON MUST BE USED TO SWITCH TEAMS!!!!

Remember the commands - Remember the button - and Enjoy!
<hr width=400>

This is an achievement map based for Counter-Strike:Source.

Note: A nav file is not included. However you can easily generate one by typing in console. "nav_generate" This will generate a NAV file for the bots.

This map has been designed to cater:

- Bomb plantation/ Defusal
- Hostage rescue
- Weapon kill streaks

I have tested this map. And got 4 achievements doing so. :)

Any questions please leave a comment or pm me and I will get back to you ASAP.

Happy cheating the achievement system :)

Holds:
4 TERRORISTS
25+ COUNTER-TERRORISTS. ( Trust me, there's enough for loads. )

This map is ONLY for CT. A total of 78 achievements are possible on this map. Acquiring these achievements takes your patience of doing things over and over (just like any other achievement map) When in-game, make sure you read all the achievements and use your common sense to acquire the particular achievement you desire.


Screenshot 1: CT spawn.
Left button spawns 3 bots (you may press this once every second) Right button removes all bots
Screenshot 2: Hostage room.
self explanatory
Screenshot 3: Prop breaking room.
Only good for "Mad Props" achievement, but I thought what the hell.
Screenshot 4: Knife room.
When you enter the teleport into the knife room, all Terrorists are teleported there. The button brings the Terrorists health to 4 for quick and easy knife killing. WARNING: This room WILL cause a dramatic drop in fps depending on how many bots you have. 31 bots took me from 499+fps to 10...you have been warned.
Screenshot 5: Terrorist spawn.
Terrorists spawn in the red half of the room. Counter Terrorists will teleport in the cyan half if they choose that door. Terrorists automatically get pushed into the center of the red room for easy killing. Press E on any gun to spawn. Button in front of the red half takes Terrorists health to 4 for quick and easy killing.
Here is just a few achievements I have gained from the map, many many more are possible obviously.
My Achievement Map, i hope you like!

_aArchiveFileTree.2: readme, you son of a bitch.txt

_sText:
This map is for all the lazy people, who just want to get those darn, new achievements. I started making it for my achievement whoring friends, so we can go back to regular play as soon as possible. While they were farming, they gave me feedback and I modified stuff, until now. It's not perfect, it wasn't ever ment to be. I just wanted to give everyone without basic HAMMER skills a chance, to farm.

Some facts about the map:
- 1 T spawn, 35 CT spawns
- cfg with all recommended cmds is included
- CT bots just have 5 HP, farming goes pretty fast
- CT weapons are located on a table to your right
- you can get 1000 kills in less than 5 minutes
- if you aim for the head, you don't even have to reload once

A readme with every step to get it running is included.

Have Fun!

PS: I will not develop it any further and my HAMMER skills are pretty basic, just FYI. If I think about it, it is even my first public released map ever.

-Use with bot_knives_only.
-Spawn as CT.
-You start with nightvision and a knife in front of the weapon spawners.
A lot of weapons to kill the bots and do the differents achievements.

This is the first Achievement map on record for counter strike source.
Enjoy earning your achievements with your friends!


-----------------------------------------------

Update for those of you whining...

its totally up to you... if you like earning the achievements the normal way so be it thats not my choice...  this is an option that is less risky than steam achievement manager... this actually not a "cheat" cheat more spoiling the chalange.

Some people enjoy just having achievements... and of course the map cant earn you all of the achievements but never the less its a method to earn achievements you would love to have and cant get in a normal server.

Rant Over...

p.s. if you still dont like it... dont comment... just leave this page and search for other maps.

This is a simple map for CS:S achievements.
There are a bombsite, 12 hostages and hostage rescue zone.
The map is created for css killing; hostage saving and bomb planting/defusing. Dont forget to create some BOTs.
Use the unlimited ammo zones to save your time.

Achievement_lambda
This is a CS:S map based on Half-life Source space.
It is a part of Lambda Reactor Complex.
You can get achievements linked to killing, saving and defusing/planting a bomb.
Bonus: Target range.

-achievement map
     kill 30 enemys within 5 seconds!
     kill 30 enemys with a single HE grenade / c4!
     get kills with every gun!
    etc.

   hint: You can't lose as t (if u aren't that silly).
         Cts can't get the guns.
         Add as mutch bots as possible!

-hostage
     rescue 50 hostages in a single round!

   hint: Don't add bots!

-defuse
     defuse the bomb in 10 seconds!

   hint: bot_add_t

-win
     win rounds and gain money for doing nothing!!

  hint: do not join t
go afk and do something else

Tipps:

"bind x mp_restartgame 1" and press x afer each round for faster roundwins
use mods like unlimited ammo; set health; deathmatch;etc

Recommanded commands:

mp_limitteams 0
mp_autoteambalance 0
mp_freezetime 0
bot_mimic 1
bot_add_ct
bot_add_ct
bot_add_ct
bot_add_ct
bot_add_ct
...

Make sure you download and uplaod the .nav file!

Bots auto spawn, there can be upto 60 depending on your slot's.

This can get you over 40 acheivments.

If you run into any problems dont forget to add these commands to your server.cfg, or run them with rcon.
(It should be fine these commands are passed from the map to the server anyway.)

// Achievment Server Cvars
mp_autoteambalance 0 
mp_limitteams 0
bot_join_team t
mp_humanteam ct


DONT FORGET THE .NAV FILE!! - ENJOY

_aChangeLog.text: Optimized the map by adding the NODRAW texture for better performance and faster loading times.
Removed the roof of the box and added a skybox with a dusk theme to go with the map name and the actual box itself.
Decreased the thickness of the walls of the box to help with FPS, loading times, compiling times, etc.

_sText:
An achievement idle map. Simple :3
Map supports up to a 30v30 (Not 100% positive about that though, I'm pretty sure it has a total of 60 spawn points, just divide them by CT and T and you'll have a 30v30.)
Have fun.  (You'll need to use certain commands to actually make an idle server if you plan to such as max money and stuff. This is not an AIO Achievement Idle map, not sure if those exist though.)

Bugs (Too long to put into the Bug Reports section.):
During map load, console is spammed about 20 lines saying that some CT and T spawn points are invalid. They should work fine though. I think the reason for this is because the player spawns inside the gun props which you can still move and stuff through them so I don't think this is a big issue.

When you join this map you will be given only the option to join as CT.
No bots or server config changes are necessary.

So what do you do, sit back and afk, after a hour or so you will have all 3 money achievement, after a few hours or so you will have Leet-er then men achievement.

Feel free to decompile just give credit were necessary. 

To track the achevments this map will assist you in getting go to:
Acheivments > Special Achevments:

Then click show on H.U.D for,

-War Bonds
-Spoils Of War
-Blood Money
-Leet-er then Men
-New world order
-Pro-Moted

Peace,
Rep

EDIT:
If you find that only 2 people can join a team make sure you run, the commands mp_autoteambalance 0  and sv_limitteams 0 with rcon.

Achievements on counter-strike? Why not make a map?

This achievement map has:

-9 Different Rooms (Not counting middle)
-Hostage Rescue
-Bombing Mode
-Buyzone
-Defusing kits for CTs at spawn
-A secret!

Not a lot, but it has almost everything to make you unlock every achievement.

YOU NEED TO PUT THIS IN THE SERVER FOR BETTER GAMEPLAY
-Respawns
-sv_airaccelerate 150 (Part of the "secret")
-10000$ Or more on start or else you can't get any weapons, will update that soon.
-Discipline (keep the damned griefers away)

I've put a glass wall where bomb and hostage targets are to prevent griefing. It's a func_breakable, so you can break it at will.
Author: KIKOSOFT GROUP. Made by me, Kalasnjikov :).

As a CT you can do bomb achievements, and hostie achevments.
As a T you can do some bomb achievements and help your CT buddy do his, then swap.

This map requires 2 people for bombs and 1 for Hostie farming.


If you find the hosties do not follow you do the following:

Do this only once on your server, to build the .nav file.

rcon_password blahblah
rcon sv_cheats 1
rcon nav_generate

Have fun.

Be sure you have mp_humanteam set to all.

Remember to check show your achievements on H.U.D


-Rep

Hey guys this is my Achievement Map for CS:S.

With this Map you can easily make your Weapon-Achievements.
In this Map you have every Weapon 3 times with 90 Ammo.
There are 184 CT Spawns and 2 Terrorist Spawns.
You have 2 Buttons. The first one to add some Bots and the second to kick them.

Achievements you could earn on this map:

• 9x19 Sidearm Expert // Kill 200 enemy players with the 9x19 Sidearm
• KM Tactical .45 Expert // Kill 200 enemy players with the KM Tactical .45
• 228 Compact Expert // Kill 200 enemy players with the 228 Compact
• .40 Dual Elites Expert // Kill 100 enemy players with the .40 Dual Elites
• ES Five-Seven Expert // Kill 100 enemy players with the ES Five-Seven
• Leone YG1265 Auto Shotgun Expert // Kill 200 enemy players with the Leone YG1265 Auto Shotgun
• Leone 12 Gauge Super Expert // Kill 200 enemy players with the Leone 12 Gauge Super
• Shotgun Master // Unlock both shotgun kill achievements
• Knife Expert // Kill 100 enemy players with the knife
• Krieg 552 Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the Krieg 552
• Krieg 550 Commando Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the Krieg 550 Commando
• Schmidt Scout Expert // Kill 1,000 enemy players with the Schmidt Scout
• Bullpup Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the Bullpup
• Clarion 5.56 Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the Clarion 5.56
• IDF Defender Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the IDF Defender
• Pistol Master // Unlock all 6 Pistol kill achievements
• CV-47 Expert // Kill 1,000 enemy players with the CV-47
• Magnum Sniper Rifle Expert // Kill 1,000 enemy players with the Magnum Sniper Rifle
• Maverick M4A1 Carbine Expert // Kill 1,000 enemy players with the Maverick M4A1 Carbine
• Ingram Mac-10 Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the Ingram Mac-10
• KM UMP45 Expert // Kill 1,000 enemy players with the KM UMP45
• Schmidt Machine Pistol Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the Schmidt Machine Pistol
• KM Sub-Machine Gun Expert // Kill 1,000 enemy players with the KM Sub-Machine Gun
• ES C90 Expert // Kill 1,000 enemy players with the ES C90
• Sub-Machine Gun Master // Unlock all 5 sub-machine gun kill achievements
• HE Grenade Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the HE grenade
• Master At Arms // Unlock every weapon kill achievement
• M249 Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the M249
• Rifle Master // Unlock all 10 rifle kill achievements
• D3/AU-1 Expert // Kill 500 enemy players with the D3/AU-1
• Night Hawk .50c Expert // Kill 200 enemy players with the Night Hawk .50c

This were all Weapons Achievements (31) which is the map made for.




But you also could gain these Achievements on this Map:

• Newb World Order // Win 10 rounds
• Points in Your Favor // Inflict 2,500 total points of damage to enemy players
• Body Bagger // Kill 25 enemies
• War Bonds // Earn $125,000 total cash
• Repeat Offender // Dominate an enemy player
• Magic Bullet // Kill an enemy with the last bullet in your magazine (excluding sniper rifles)
• Overkill // Kill an opponent you are already dominating
• Mercy Rule // Kill the entire opposing team without any members of your team dying
• Insurgent // Kill an enemy player that is dominating you
• Blitzkrieg // Win a round in less than 30 seconds (against at least 5 enemy players)
• Avenging Angel // Kill an enemy player in the same round as they kill a player on your friends list
• Hip Shot // Kill an enemy with an un-zoomed sniper rifle
• Head Shred Redemption // Kill 5 enemy players with headshots in a single round
• Make the Cut // Win a knife fight
• The Unstoppable Force //  Kill 10 enemy players in a single round
• The Cleaner // Kill the entire enemy team (with at least 5 players) in a single round
• Dead Man Stalking // Kill an enemy while at 1 health
• Excessive Brutality // Kill an enemy player 4 additional times while you are dominating them
• Decimator // Dominate a total of 10 enemy players#
• Ballistic // Kill 5 enemy players within 15 seconds
• Hat Trick // Dominate three enemy players simultaneously
• Ammo Conservation // Kill two enemy players with a single bullet
• Premature Burial // Kill an enemy with a grenade after you've died
• Variety Hour // Get kills with 5 different guns in a round
• Ten Angry Men // Get 10 kills on enemy players you are already dominating during a single match
• You've Made Your Points // Inflict 50,000 total points of damage to enemy players
• Pro-moted // Win 200 rounds
• Death From Above // Kill an enemy player while you are airborne
• Corpseman // Kill 500 enemies
• Clean Sweep // Kill the entire opposing team without any members of your team taking any damage
• Battle Sight Zero // Kill 250 enemy players with headshots
• The Frugal Beret // Win 10 rounds without dying and not spending any cash
• Friendly Firearms // Kill 100 enemy players with enemy weapons
• The Art of War // Spray 100 decals
• Black Bag Operation // Win a round while making no footstep noise and killing at least one enemy
• Command and Control // Get a total of 100 kills on enemy players you are dominating
• Spoils of War // Earn $2,500,000 total cash
• Expert Marksman // Get a kill with every weapon
• Cold War // Win a round without your team killing any enemy players
• Three the Hard Way // Kill 3 enemy players with a single HE grenade
• The Bleeding Edge // Win 100 knife fights
• A Million Points of Blight // Inflict 1,000,000 total points of damage to enemy players
• Leet-er of Men // Win 5000 rounds
• Blood Money // Earn $50,000,000 total cash
• God of War //  Kill 10,000 enemies
• Piece Initiative // Win 5 Pistol Rounds
• Give Piece a Chance // Win 25 Pistol Rounds
• Piece Treaty // Win 250 Pistol Rounds
• Target-Hardened // Survive damage from 5 different players within a round
• Snipe Hunter // Kill 100 zoomed-in enemy snipers
• Can't Keep a Good Man Down // Kill a total of 20 enemy players that are dominating you
• Friendly Attire // Start a round on the same team as 4 of your friends, with all of you wearing the same outfit
• Aerial Necrobatics // Kill an airborne enemy while you are also airborne
• Lost and F0wnd // KIll an enemy player with a gun they dropped that round
• Sknifed // Kill a zoomed-in enemy sniper with a knife
• Dressed to Kill // Start a round with all players on your team wearing the same uniform (at least 5 players)
• Street Fighter // Kill an enemy player with a knife during the pistol round
• Shrapnelproof // Take 80 points of damage from enemy grenades and still survive the round
• Kill One, Get One Spree // Kill an enemy player who is on a killing spree
• Bunny Hunt // Kill an airborne enemy
• War of Attrition // Be the last player alive in a round (with at least 5 players on your team)
• The Immovable Object // Kill an enemy player who has just killed 10 of your teammates in a single round
• Primer // Do at least 95% damage to an enemy who is then killed by a another player
• Finishing Schooled // Kill an enemy player who has been reduced to less than 5% health by other players
• Shot With Their Pants Down // Kill an enemy player while they are reloading




This are 65 Achievements! So you could earn total 96 Achievements on this Map!


Have fun  on playing AchievementsWeaponsFinal by Tyrox :)

Maps created by Farmer69.

V2 fixes; 
Fixed all the pistol and sub-machinegun farming maps.
Fixed the planting/defusing map.
Fixed the snipe_hunter map.
Added a tutorial on how everything works "farm_a1Tutorial.bsp"

Please run the tutorial first, then go ahead and farm some achievements.

Simply move all the maps into your
C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\ACCOUNT-NAME\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps

All the maps are automatic, just start a local server with the map you want, and join T.

In the bomb/defuse map, you might need 1 friend for certain achievements.

For the hostage rescue achievement farming map, join CT, ofc. The map can farm for you around 8 hostages/10sec
Calculations; 500 hostages in 10 minutes.

Always use the map "farm_purifier" to remove any annoying commands that get stuck to your console after farming.

Now, grab some snack and enjoy the show. I'd advice you not to AFK for more than 15 minutes;
The map might glitch and/or your stats get to exaggerated.

!!!These maps do NOT work on dedicated servers, only local servers hosted by the person farming!!!

Maps created by Farmer69.

Simply move all the maps into your 
C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\ACCOUNT-NAME\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps

All the maps are automatic, just start a local server with the map you want, and join T.

This map FORCES your console to run client commands, such as; 

+attack (Makes you shoot)
+moveleft (Makes you strafe left)
+duck (Makes you crouch)

This is NOT cheating and is NOT illegal, if you want to farm, this is the best way you'll find.

farm_sniped is for the "Snipe Hunter" Achievement.

In the bomb/defuse map, you might need 1 friend for certain achievements-
If you're not satisfied with the round ending after each defuse, simply type;

mp_ignore_round_win_conditions 1

For the hostage rescue achievement farming map, join CT, ofc. The map can farm for you around 8 hostages/10sec
Calculations; 500 hostages in 10 minutes.

Always use the map "farm_purifier" to remove any annoying commands that get stuck to your console after farming.

Now, grab some snack and enjoy the show. I'd advice you not to AFK for more than 15 minutes;
The map might glitch and/or your stats get to exaggerated.

!!!These maps do NOT work on dedicated servers, only local servers hosted by the person farming!!!

Cstrike/maps/

Create New Game, Add 1 Bot, Set All time options to 0, Start Game, Open Console type; mp_round_start_delay 0 ;or something like that and go !
